verses.verse: And this was the lot <WH1486> for the tribe <WH4294> of Manasseh <WH4519>; for he was the first-born <WH1060> of Joseph <WH3130>. As for Machir <WH4353> the first-born <WH1060> of Manasseh <WH4519>, the father <WH1> of Gilead <WH1568>, because he was a man <WH376> of war <WH4421>, therefore he had Gilead <WH1568> and Bashan <WH1316>.

So the lot was for the rest <WH3498> of the children <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519> according to their families <WH4940>: for the children <WH1121> of Abiezer <WH44>, and for the children <WH1121> of Helek <WH2507>, and for the children <WH1121> of Asriel <WH844>, and for the children <WH1121> of Shechem <WH7928>, and for the children <WH1121> of Hepher <WH2660>, and for the children <WH1121> of Shemida <WH8061>: these were the male <WH2145> children <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519> the son <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130> according to their families <WH4940>.

But Zelophehad <WH6765>, the son <WH1121> of Hepher <WH2660>, the son <WH1121> of Gilead <WH1568>, the son <WH1121> of Machir <WH4353>, the son <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519>, had no sons <WH1121>, but daughters <WH1323>: and these are the names <WH8034> of his daughters <WH1323>: Mahlah <WH4244>, and Noah <WH5270>, Hoglah <WH2295>, Milcah <WH4435>, and Tirzah <WH8656>.

And they came near <WH7126> before <WH6440> Eleazar <WH499> the priest <WH3548>, and before <WH6440> Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>, and before <WH6440> the princes <WH5387>, saying <WH559>, Jehovah <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872> to give <WH5414> us an inheritance <WH5159> among <WH8432> our brethren <WH251>: therefore according to the commandment <WH6310> of Jehovah <WH3068> he gave <WH5414> them an inheritance <WH5159> among <WH8432> the brethren <WH251> of their father <WH1>.
And there fell <WH5307> ten <WH6235> parts <WH2256> to Manasseh <WH4519>, besides the land <WH776> of Gilead <WH1568> and Bashan <WH1316>, which is beyond <WH5676> the Jordan <WH3383>;

because the daughters <WH1323> of Manasseh <WH4519> had <WH5157> an inheritance <WH5159> among <WH8432> his sons <WH1121>. And the land <WH776> of Gilead <WH1568> belonged unto the rest <WH3498> of the sons <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519>.

And the border <WH1366> of Manasseh <WH4519> was from Asher <WH836> to Michmethath <WH4366>, which is before <WH6440> Shechem <WH7927>; and the border <WH1366> went along <WH1980> to the right hand <WH3225>, unto the inhabitants <WH3427> of En-tappuah <WH5887>.
The land <WH776> of Tappuah <WH8599> belonged to Manasseh <WH4519>; but Tappuah <WH8599> on the border <WH1366> of Manasseh <WH4519> belonged to the children <WH1121> of Ephraim <WH669>.

And the border <WH1366> went down <WH3381> unto the brook <WH5158> of Kanah <WH7071>, southward <WH5045> of the brook <WH5158>: these cities <WH5892> belonged to Ephraim <WH669> among <WH8432> the cities <WH5892> of Manasseh <WH4519>: and the border <WH1366> of Manasseh <WH4519> was on the north side <WH6828> of the brook <WH5158>, and the goings <WH8444> out thereof were at the sea <WH3220>:

southward <WH5045> it was Ephraim <WH669>'s, and northward <WH6828> it was Manasseh <WH4519>'s, and the sea <WH3220> was his border <WH1366>; and they reached <WH6293> to Asher <WH836> on the north <WH6828>, and to Issachar <WH3485> on the east <WH4217>.

And Manasseh <WH4519> had in Issachar <WH3485> and in Asher <WH836> Beth-shean <WH1052> and its towns <WH1323>, and Ibleam <WH2991> and its towns <WH1323>, and the inhabitants <WH3427> of Dor <WH1756> and its towns <WH1323>, and the inhabitants <WH3427> of En-dor <WH5874> and its towns <WH1323>, and the inhabitants <WH3427> of Taanach <WH8590> and its towns <WH1323>, and the inhabitants <WH3427> of Megiddo <WH4023> and its towns <WH1323>, even the three <WH7969> heights <WH5316>.

Yet the children <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519> could <WH3201> not drive out <WH3423> the inhabitants of those cities <WH5892>; but the Canaanites <WH3669> would <WH2974> dwell <WH3427> in that land <WH776>.

And it came to pass <WH1121>, when the children of Israel <WH3478> were waxed strong <WH2388>, that they put <WH5414> the Canaanites <WH3669> to taskwork <WH4522>, and did not utterly <WH3423> drive them out <WH3423>.

And the children <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130> spake <WH1696> unto Joshua <WH3091>, saying <WH559>, Why hast thou given <WH5414> me but one <WH259> lot <WH1486> and one <WH259> part <WH2256> for an inheritance <WH5159>, seeing I am a great <WH7227> people <WH5971>, forasmuch as <WH5704> hitherto <WH3541> Jehovah <WH3068> hath blessed me <WH1288>?

And Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> unto them <WH7227>, If thou be a great people <WH5971>, get thee up <WH5927> to the forest <WH3293>, and cut down <WH1254> for thyself there in the land <WH776> of the Perizzites <WH6522> and of the Rephaim <WH7497>; since the hill-country <WH2022> of Ephraim <WH669> is too narrow for thee <WH213>.

And the children <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130> said <WH559>, The hill-country <WH2022> is not enough <WH4672> for us <WH3669>: and all the Canaanites that dwell <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of the valley <WH6010> have chariots <WH7393> of iron <WH1270>, both they who are in Beth-shean <WH1052> and its towns <WH1323>, and they who are in the valley <WH6010> of Jezreel <WH3157>.

And Joshua <WH3091> spake <WH559> unto the house <WH1004> of Joseph <WH3130>, even to Ephraim <WH669> and to Manasseh <WH4519>, saying <WH559>, Thou art a great <WH7227> people <WH5971>, and hast great <WH1419> power <WH3581>; thou shalt not have one <WH259> lot only <WH1486>:

but the hill-country <WH2022> shall be thine <WH3293>; for though it is a forest, thou shalt cut it down <WH1254>, and the goings <WH8444> out thereof shall be thine <WH3423>; for thou shalt drive out the Canaanites <WH3669>, though they have chariots <WH7393> of iron <WH1270>, and though they are strong <WH2389>.
